casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America ex rel. Hans ACKERMANN, Appellant, v. J. L. O’ROURKE, Officer In Charge of Alien Internment Camp at Crystal City, Texas, Appellee. No. 11882. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Nov. 14, 1947. E. M. Grimes, of Taylor, Tex., for appellant. Henry W. Moursund, U. S. Atty., and Joel W. Westbrook, Asst. U. S. Atty, both of San Antonio, Tex., for appellee.

Before SIBLEY, HOLMES, and McCORD, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed.
